languages.text: Трон снабжен системой подачи проводящего заряда и в любой момент может превратиться в инструмент аутодафе.

traits.locale_text: Каждый трон снабжен грубой системой подачи электричества. Рабочие места сконструированы так, чтобы умертвить астропата высоковольтным разрядом при первых признаках безумия.

languages.text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.
languages.original_text: Трон снабжен системой подачи проводящего заряда и в любой момент может превратиться в инструмент аутодафе.

traits.locale_text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.
The throne is furnished with a Motive Force supply and can be turned into an instrument of auto-da-fe at any moment.
The throne is furnished with a Motive Force supply and can be turned into an electric chair at any moment.
The throne is furnished with a Motive Force supply and can be turned into an electric chair at any moment.
The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.

languages.text: El trono está equipado con un suministro de carga conductiva y puede convertirse en instrumento de ejecución en cualquier momento.
languages.original_text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.

traits.locale_text: El trono está equipado con un suministro de Fuerza Motriz y puede convertirse en instrumento de ejecución en cualquier momento.

languages.text: 王座には導電性の装置が備え付けられており、いつでも処刑装置に変えることができる。
languages.original_text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.

traits.locale_text: 王座には原動力が供給されていて、いつでも実行の道具に使えそうだ。

languages.text: 宝座装有电力供应缆线，随时都可以改造成刑具。
languages.original_text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.

traits.locale_text: 宝座装有源力供应缆线，随时都可以改造成刑具。

languages.text: Der Thron wird durch eine leitende Entladung mit Energie versorgt und kann jederzeit in ein Hinrichtungswerkzeug verwandelt werden.
languages.original_text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.

traits.locale_text: Der Thron ist mit einer Antriebskraftversorgung ausgestattet und kann jederzeit in ein Hinrichtungswerkzeug verwandelt werden.

languages.text: Le trône est doté d'une réserve de charge conductrice et peut être transformé en instrument d'exécution à tout moment.
languages.original_text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.

traits.locale_text: Le trône est doté d'une réserve de Force Motrice et peut être transformé en instrument d'exécution à tout moment.

languages.text: İletken yük kaynağı ile donatılmış taht, istendiği an bir infaz aracına dönüştürülebilir.
languages.original_text: The throne is furnished with a conductive charge supply and can be turned into an instrument of execution at any moment.
